page.title: 05LIFE -STYLE
page.content: This is a predominantly{wealthy area } of the country. The houses are large with secluded gardens. Many families run{two cars}and send their children to{private schools.}The women are fashion concious and enjoy wearing boutique style clothing rather than clothing from Chain Stores. There are lots of{pubs}in the area though the landlords suggested their appeal was mainly to the under 35's. Eating out is popular though there are no large restaurants in this neighbourhood. Many of the residents are {Commuters and travel upto 50 miles to work each day.It is a mobile population moving on with job promotion. We found only a few people who had grandparents born locally.
